# @superhuman/origin

<img src="https://gitlab.grammarly.io/uifoundation/origin/-/badges/release.svg?value_width=100" alt="Latest version"/>

## About

This package contains everything needed to build and use [Origin](https://designsystem.grammarly.io) tokens and components.

## Development

Useful commands:

- `pnpm -w storybook` to start storybook, which makes local development much easier.
- `pnpm test:watch` to start unit tests in watch mode
- `pnpm build` to generate all tokens, icons, and CSS
